title: Issues posting on the boards
body: For some odd reason, I am unable to post on the boards unless it is under Help & Support or Mechs vs Minions. Some kind of glitch? I've never used the boards before now, but I have a question regarding League skin "mockups" that I'd like to post under the Concepts and Creations board.

replies.body: Not a glitch!  Some regions of the boards have level requirements for posting, except support sections like H&S,  When you post for the first time, your account may need to sync to the boards and get your correct level.   Your account is showing up as 30 now, so let me know if this is still an issue!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dJsHlERi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-11T17:08:26.839+0000)
>
> Not a glitch!  Some regions of the boards have level requirements for posting, except support sections like H&S,  When you post for the first time, your account may need to sync to the boards and get your correct level.   Your account is showing up as 30 now, so let me know if this is still an issue!

Working now, thanks for the info, had no clue the boards worked like that.
